actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1739 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a project for modification of Portsmouth Harbor and the Piscataqua River Basin in Maine and New Hampshire.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the project for modification of Portsmouth Harbor and the Piscataqua River Basin in Maine and New Hampshire.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a project for modification of Portsmouth Harbor and the Piscataqua River Basin in Maine and New Hampshire.
